SEARCH
Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class ServerMessageGenerator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.ServerMessageGenerator
public class ServerMessageGenerator extends Object
This class is responsible for generating JSON messages that are sent to clients throughout the game. These messages inform players about game state, their hand and deck information, and other relevant game events.

  • Method Details

    • cardsSelectionMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject cardsSelectionMessage(StarterCard starterCard, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard1, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard2)
      This message is sent to each player before the beginning of the match so that they can select the starter card orientation and their secrete objective.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - The given to the player.
      objectiveCard1 - The first objective card that can be selected.
      objectiveCard2 - The second objective card that can be selected.
      Returns:
      The message containing these three cards.

    • startGameMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject startGameMessage(GameController gameController, Player player)
      This message is sent to each player at the beginning of the match.
      Parameters:
      gameController - The game controller of the current match.
      player - The player who is playing the current match.
      Returns:
      The message containing all the necessary information the player needs to start the match.

    • updatedHandMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject updatedHandMessage(Player player)
      This message sends to a player his updated hand.
      Parameters:
      player - The player with the updated hand.
      Returns:
      The message containing the updated hand.

    • turnPlayerUpdateMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject turnPlayerUpdateMessage(GameController gameController)
      This message is sent to notify the beginning of a player's turn.
      Parameters:
      gameController - The game controller is used to get the player's name.
      Returns:
      The message showing which player is about to play and his name.

    • updatedDecksMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject updatedDecksMessage()
      This message is sent to players in order to update the decks after each draw.
      Returns:
      The message containing updated information about the decks.

    • successfulPlaceMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject successfulPlaceMessage(Player player)
      This message is sent when the player executes a successful placement.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who places the card.
      Returns:
      The message containing updated information (score, his hand, resources on the game-field).

    • cannotPlaceMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject cannotPlaceMessage(String reason)
      This message is sent when a player cannot place a card for a particular reason.
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason that explains why the placement is incorrect.
      Returns:
      The message to the player.

    • updatedScoresMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject updatedScoresMessage(GameController gameController)
      This message is sent to notify players' updated scores after each turn.
      Parameters:
      gameController - The game controller of the current game.
      Returns:
      The message containing all the players' scores.

    • lastRoundMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject lastRoundMessage(String reason)
      This message informs the players that they're playing the last round.
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason that explains what triggered the last round.
      Returns:
      Rhe message that informs the players.

    • leaderBoardMessage

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject leaderBoardMessage(GameController gameController, ArrayList<ClientHandler> clientHandlers)
      This message sends to the players their final scores when the game is ended.
      Returns:
      The final scores.

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject closingGameMessage()
      Message sent when a client loses connection to inform the other clients that the game is getting cancelled
